annotations.description: On this episode of How to Drink, I’m making a Champagne Cocktail from Casablanca, which happens to be a big favorite of mine. The drink is fairly straightfor...
annotations.title: Champagne Cocktail | How to Drink

textContent:
.5oz Cognac
Barspoon Gomme/Simple syrup
2 Dashes bitters
1 Dash absinthe

Stir and pour
Top with champagne
Garnish with cherry or lemon peel

title: Champagne Cocktail
